name: Robert Mundell
institution: University of Chicago (1965–72) ,  University of Waterloo (1972–74) ,  McGill University (1989–1990) ,  Columbia University (1974 – present) ,  Chinese University of Hong Kong (2009 – present)
alma_mater: London School of Economics, UBC Vancouver School of Economics, University of Washington, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
influenced: Rudi Dornbusch, Jacob Frenkel, Michael Mussa, Carmen Reinhart
contributions: Mundell–Fleming model, Optimum currency areas, Research on the gold standard
